title: ***3 Bedroom/1 Bathroom***
app_fee: Application fee for each tenant over age 18
posting_body: East Garfield Park brick Row House apartment minutes from West Loop and downtown.
Ten minutes to downtown via the Green Line just 3 blocks away.
One mile from I-290 with quick access to the Kennedy or Dan Ryan expressways.
3 blocks to Metra train station.
Three Bedroom/One Bathroom South facing apartment in brick Row House with plenty of natural light.
Non-smoking apartment.
New paint.
New hardwood floors in living room, dining room and kitchen.
New carpet installed in all Bedrooms, each with separate closets.
Each bedroom has newly installed ceiling fans.
Remodeled bathroom with jacuzzi tub and shower.
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Washer and dryer in unit.
Exposed brick fireplace with 10' ceilings.
Central Heat / Central Air.
One rear parking spot available with apartment.
Gas and electric are tenant's responsibilities.
$45 Application Fee for each tenant over 18 years old
Pets Allowed for $400 (non-refundable fee)
Serious Inquiries Only contact Marcello (312)208-9795
